author: gmcdonald
msg: Move xml/security is now santuario. INFRA-2924

author: pete
msg: Caching duration should not require a [long], having an [int] with roughly 2^31 seconds (~ 68 years) should be enough. Especially since RFC-2616 suggests caching should not exceed one year.
This will adjust to IResourceSettings#getDefaultCacheDuration() which already was an [int].

author: markt
msg: Fix an issue where <Context .../> elements defined in server.xml did not use the configClass specified by the parent <Host .../> element
